attributes.action: Review motorway speedlimits, whilst introducing penalties for dangerous and unsocial driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorway speedlimits should be increased to 90mph reflect the increase in car safety technology and the general speeds. However, penalties should be introduced and enforced for unsafe and dangerous driving, no matter what speed and for unsocial driving such as middle lane hogging.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
